content: {A害羞挠头}<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>... about that food from before, well, anyway... Starting with "thank you" is always the safest, yep!

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>... I, you... Mmmmmph! What I want to say is, {A害羞挠头}I'm happy to see you, yes I am!

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>! I have to tell you, your planet is juuust {A大笑}perfect for living a slow, peaceful life with Kabutomaru.

content: {A两眼放光}I found out that if you go bam-bam against trees, Kabutomaru will fall off them! <style=PlayerName>{me}</style> This place is suuuper magical, it is!

content: {A心虚目移}Caught in the act?! Mmph, I-I wasn't doing anything bad! <style=SizeSmall>Secretly cutting all the trees to see if any Kabutomaru falls out doesn't count as bad, right...?</style>
